body_html: @yjxiong is right. Functions are meant to be short lived (one application max!). Since this came out we've actually changed how functions work to make it clearer (forward and backward are now static methods), so this should be resolved now.
body_text: @yjxiong is right. Functions are meant to be short lived (one application max!). Since this came out we've actually changed how functions work to make it clearer (forward and backward are now static methods), so this should be resolved now.
body: @yjxiong is right. Functions are meant to be short lived (one application max!). Since this came out we've actually changed how functions work to make it clearer (`forward` and `backward` are now static methods), so this should be resolved now.
